subject: Delivery issue with order #SSN3827
description_text:
Hello,
I have a problem with the order #SSN3827. There has been a problem with the
delivery, stating that the packet was oversize\overweight and it has been
resended to you (I guess). I have atached two screenshots from the delivery
service website, where states this problem and the new waybill number,
confirming that the packet has been received (by you i guess).

Old waybill: SF6047082678264

New waybill: SF3295212713544

All of this without any update in the simsonn website.

I hope you can solve this as soon as possible.

Regards,
Ignacio.

conversations.body_text: Hi warrendongo5,    We apologize for the inconvenience. The inventory at our German warehouse has been depleted, so we are unable to ship your order via this tax-free channel. We can expedite your shipment using UPS, but customs duties will likely apply. Alternatively, we can wait until around the 10th to ship your order from the German warehouse. Would that be acceptable?

Hello,
Okay, i would prefer waiting until around the 10th to avoid possible custom
charges.
I guess the order page will be updated, so i can follow the new delivery.

Thank you,
Ignacio.

El mi√©, 3 dic 2025, 10:44, service@simsonn.com
Hi warrendongo5,    Thank you for your reply. We will update the shipping information after dispatch.

Hello,
Are there any news regarding stock or shipping? From december 21st to 26th
i will not be at home.

Regards.

El jue, 4 dic 2025, 13:02, service@simsonn.com
